    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CourseContentsViewImpl, CourseInformationViewImpl, DetectionViewImpl, PreprocessesViewImpl, QuestionGenerationViewImpl

    public abstract class AbstractStepView
extends com.vaadin.ui.VerticalLayout
implements ViewWithMenu
    Project: Masterthesis of Sascha Feldmann Creation date: 23.05.2016 Author: Sascha Feldmann (sascha.feldmann@gmx.de)

    University: Hochschule f√ºr Technik und Wirtschaft, Berlin Fachbereich 4 Studiengang Internationale Medieninformatik (Master)

    Company: adesso AG

    This abstract view defines the basic components that each view in the application has, e.g. the current step indicator etc. It notifies the set MenuListener instance on menu item click.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
